subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Justin Wilson, who had a 3.10 E.R.A. in 74 appearances last season, was shipped to the Detroit Tigers for the pitching prospects Luis Cessa and Chad Green.
snippet: Justin Wilson, who had a 3.10 E.R.A. in 74 appearances last season, was shipped to the Detroit Tigers for the pitching prospects Luis Cessa and Chad Green.
